name: Student Taught Courses (StuCo):UXplore: Uncover the Best of Modern UX Design
base_name: Student Taught Courses (StuCo):UXplore: Uncover the Best of Modern UX Design
long_desc: Good design is invisible. Beautifully designed things are often subtle, minimal, working in the background. It is bad design that usually hits you in the face, that stands out and can be uncomfortable. This course will uncover the hidden good designs in the products, services, and UIs we work with daily.   We will explore the principles and best practices of modern product, service, and UI design through the examination of realworld examples. Each week, we will explore a different example of good design and analyze the elements that make it successful. We will look at the latest trends and techniques in the industry, and learn how to apply them to your own projects. Throughout the course, we will examine the user experience and consider how design decisions affect the users perception and engagement. We will also learn how to use data to inform design decisions. The class will be a mix of lectures, discussions, and activities. We will also have guest lecturers Designers, PMs, etc. to discuss industry experience and throughout the course By the end of the course, students will have a deeper understanding of how to design userfriendly and visually appealing products and services. There are no prerequisites for the class interest is more than enough

custom_fields.goals: Learn the basics of UX design in user interfaces, products, and services. Be able to understand how and what design choices were made for modern designs.
custom_fields.key_topics: UI design, UX design, user research, service design, product design
custom_fields.prerequisite_knowledge: There are no prerequisites for the class: interest is more than enough!
custom_fields.assessment_structure: Students will be assessed based on participation (including attendance) as well as a combined midterm/final project.
custom_fields.relevance: Real-life examples of applicable modern designs.
custom_fields.learning_resources: Lecture slides and other online resources.
custom_fields.extra_time_commitment: Weekly discussion post and project work.
